ctx: intros f x v s nv.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros f x v s nv.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros f x v s nv. unfold substituteFormula, substituteFormulaHelp. destruct (Nat.eq_dec x v) as [eq|neq]. - now destruct (Nat.eq_dec x v), (in_dec Nat.eq_dec x (freeVarTerm s)). - destruct (in_dec Nat.eq_dec x (freeVarTerm s)) as [in_s|nin_s]. + now destruct (Nat.eq_dec x v), (in_dec Nat.eq_dec x (freeVarTerm s)). + now destruct (Nat.eq_dec x v), (in_dec Nat.eq_dec x (freeVarTerm s)).
